tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah An-Naziat, Ayah 15?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The life of Pharaoh and other deniers of the truth like him provides proof of the fact that one who denies realities is ultimately punished for it. These historical examples are enough to teach man a lesson
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse narrates a historical event

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse primarily teach us?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The magnificent phenomenon before us in the shape of the universe is so great that all other things are small in comparison to it. So, in the world when the occurrence of a big event is possible, why should the occurrence of a small event not be possible
distractors: This verse is about the battles of early Muslims
This verse talks about the Day of Judgment only
This verse describes the creation of mankind

tafsirQuiz.question: What is the central theme of this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: One is the present world, which is before him, and the second is the world of the Hereafter, which is hidden from view. The real test of man is that he should prefer the Hereafter to the present world
distractors: This verse is about the battles of early Muslims
This verse describes the creation of mankind
